comment: Pretty chill professor, no complaints. There is an opportunity for extra credit, but the class is so easy you probably won't need it. Discussion posts require 500+ words, which is a little annoying, but there are only 2, and they are not hard. Assignments are very easy, but the first one was long. There is a lot of time between due dates.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: Professor Bulim's class isn't necessarily hard I just feel like I didn't learn much. Not sure if it's his fault or if it's just how the course is set up

He is understanding and communicative based on emails. Work is a few assignments scattered through the semester, midterm/final (locked/camera) but is just the quiz questions compiled into an exam. Weekly chapters and quizzes. He wants you to learn and isn't too bad of a professor honestly, just have to put some effort into studying the PowerPoint.
Professor is strict but fair. Follow the instructions, read the text book and do and submit your work on time and you will be fine.
